qualities.name: ABSOLUTE EVASION
qualities.description:
Incompatible: **UNCATCHABLE TARGET**
The Digimon gains automatic Successes equal to the **Ranks** in **ABSOLUTE EVASION**. These automatic Successes are deducted from the Base **Dodge** Pool.

However, every time the Digimon would suffer a **Dodge** penalty from consecutive Dodging, the automatic Successes are removed instead until none remain. When the Digimon would reset its **Dodge** Pool at the end of its turn, it regains these automatic Successes.

qualities.name: AVOIDANCE I
qualities.description:
**Once per round** (which resets at the end of the Digimon's turns), the Digimon may reroll any 1's that appear when making a **Dodge Check**.

**This Quality does not affect Bonus Dice granted from Tamer Actions.**

qualities.name: AVOIDANCE II
qualities.description:
**Once per round** (which resets at the end of the Digimon's turns), the Digimon may reroll any 1's and 2's that appear when making a **Dodge Check**.

**This Quality does not affect Bonus Dice granted from Tamer Actions.**

qualities.name: COMBAT AWARENESS I
qualities.description:
The Digimon can now make **Awareness Checks** as 1 **Action** instead of 2 **Actions**.

The Digimon adds its **Ranks** in this Quality to its **Initiative**.

The Digimon adds its **Ranks** in this Quality to its **ACC** and **DOD** for the first **Round** of Combat.

qualities.name: COMBAT AWARENESS II
qualities.description:
The Digimon can now make **Awareness Checks** as 1 **Action** instead of 2 **Actions**.

The Digimon adds its **Ranks** in this Quality to its **Initiative**.

The Digimon adds its **Ranks** in this Quality to its **ACC**, **DOD** and **Movement** for the first **Round** of Combat. It also adds its **Ranks** in this Quality to **Awareness Checks**.

qualities.name: COMBAT AWARENESS III
qualities.description:
The Digimon can now make **Awareness Checks** as 1 **Action** instead of 2 **Actions**.

The Digimon adds its **Ranks** in this Quality to its **Initiative**.

The Digimon adds its **Ranks** in this Quality to its **ACC**, **DOD** and **Movement** for the first **Round** of Combat. It also adds its **Ranks** in this Quality to **Awareness Checks**.

The Digimon also treats **Surprise Rounds** triggered against it as a normal **Round** of Combat.

The Digimon no longer suffers any penalty to **Awareness Checks** based on sight, such as obscured areas. The Digimon automatically spots any Digimon attempting to **Hide** if they do not roll above a **TN** of 10 + the Digimon's **DOS**.

qualities.name: COMBAT MONSTER
qualities.description:
Incompatible: **CROSS COUNTER | SUMMONER | CONJURER | POSITIVE REINFORCEMENT**
Whenever the Digimon takes **Damage** from an Enemy, or from its own Qualities, it gains **Resolve** equal to the **Damage** taken. The maximum **Resolve** a Digimon can have is equal to its **Stage** + 2.

When the Digimon successfully makes an **Attack**, all **Resolve** is expended and added to the **DAM** of the **Attack**. **Resolve** also resets at the end of Combat.

You only gain **Resolve** from **Damage** taken to **Wound Boxes**.

qualities.name: BULLET PROOF
qualities.description:
When this Digimon is Attacked, any further **Attack** from the same Attacker suffers a penalty to **ACC** and **DAM** equal to the Digimon's **Stage**.

The Digimon's **ARM** can reduce the **Damage** of any **Attack** affected by this Quality to 0.

This penalty resets at the end of the Digimon's turn.

qualities.name: SUBSTITUTE
qualities.description:
Right as the Digimon is hit by an attack, before taking **Damage** it may choose to make a decoy to take the blow instead. The Digimon makes a **RAM (Evasion) Check** as a **Free Action**.

**Success**: The Digimon forfeits **Wound Boxes** equal to its **Stage** + 1.
**Critical Success**: The Digimon only forfeits half as many **Wound Boxes**.

Each time this Quality is used, the **TN** increases by 3 for any further use until the end of Combat.

**SUBSTITUTE** cannot be used to avoid an **Attack** while in a **Clash**.
